title: The Last Gardener

atmosphere_notes: Climactic crisis. Enforcement triggered by one stubborn girl. Horror at 58,640 death sentence. Desperate dive into deep code. Discovery of succession clause. Creative reinterpretation of protocols through Kessa-pattern thinking. Claiming creator authority. Constitutional amendment. Sterilization aborted. Three human types recognized. Victory through loophole. Kessa's legacy visible in solution. Sage recognizing friend's persistence. Triumph mixed with recognition of continued transformation. Near-perfect evacuation (99.91%). 37 days to completion. Framework for perpetual coexistence established. Tone: crisis → desperation → revelation → reinterpretation → salvation.

continuity_notes.timeline_check: Day 4,800 = 690 days after Ch12 (Day 4,110) = 23 months. Four-year evacuation started Day 3,350. Day 4,800 = 1,450 days = 3.97 years ≈ 3 years 10 months. Consistent with '37 days remaining' to 4-year deadline.
continuity_notes.evacuation_math: 27,000 total to evacuate. 26,977 done = 99.91% success. 23 remaining. Breakdown: 14,847 shelter + 743 adapted + 11,387 relocated = 26,977. Checks.
continuity_notes.death_calculation: 47,000 completion + 11,387 relocated = 58,387 ≈ 58,640 (slight rounding or population increase). 14,847 shelter + 743 adapted = 15,590 would survive. Math consistent.
continuity_notes.contamination: Ch12: 1.7% in 2 years. Ch17: 2.87% in 3.97 years. Increase: 1.17% in 1.97 years = 0.59%/year. Ch12 rate: 0.85%/year. Slight deceleration possible as cascade approaches asymptote. Reasonably consistent.
continuity_notes.character_arcs: Shepherd: 0.60 → 0.85 (claimed creator authority, constitutional amendment, near-completion of evacuation). Sage: 0.95 → 0.98 (recognition of achievement, acceptance of three-human future). Mira: new character at 0.10 (catalyst for crisis).

foreshadowing: Three human types foreshadow Ch20 resolution showing coexistence

Three human variants as diversity strength
Shepherding rather than gardening (protection over control)
narrative_position: Climax chapter (tentpole 4 of 5), enforcement triggered by Mira's contamination, Shepherd claims successor creator authority via hidden succession clause, constitutional amendment rewrites 2-million-year protocols, sterilization aborted saving 58,640 lives, three human types officially recognized and protected, evacuation 99.91% complete with 37 days remaining, framework for perpetual plurality established, Kessa-pattern's creativity saves everyone through loophole, zero enforcement deaths maintained. Sets up Ch18-19 completion of evacuation and Ch20 resolution showing long-term coexistence success.
